QuestData.Title: Dark Developments
QuestData.Description:
<The torn document appears to have been written by Surgeon Stitchflesh.>
...the kyrian flesh improves strength, obedience, and dexterity twofold! Such potential!
Now, if subject number one-three-five succeeds in a proper wing transplant at last...
<It continues on for some time. You should bring this to your kyrian allies.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the Abhorrent Design to Artemede.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Bring the Abhorrent Design to Artemede outside the Hall of Chains.
QuestData.RewardText: Allow me to read this for a moment.
